Li3ib is a simple way to book the sport that you want to play. Discover new venues to play at or book your favorite field without the hassle of calling. Join the sports community and find out about tournaments and leagues near you that you can compete in and when. 

Use Li3ib to:
• Book your favorite sport and choose whether you want to pay cash or online.
• Invite your friends to join the game you booked or easily join the bookings that your friends created. You can also share each specific booking so your friends easily know where and when to play.
• Easily manage each booking to see which friends have joined and which ones you need to remind. You can even chat with your friends about the specific games you're playing.
• Register to tournaments and leagues near you and monitor the standings and scores.


لعب هي طريقة بسيطة لحجز الرياضة التي تفضلها. استكشف المنشآت الرياضية أو احجز ملعبك المفضل بدون الاتصال. انضم للمجتمع الرياضي و اكتشف البطولات القريبة للمشاركة و الفوز بها.

استخدم لعب و:
• احجز رياضتك المفضلة و اختر طريقة الدفع (اونلاين أو كاش)
• اعزم ربعك للانضمام لمباراتك أو انضم لمبارياتهم. يمكنك أيضاً إرسال حجز معين لمعرفة متى و أين ستقام المباراة
• قم بإدارة الحجز لمعرفة من انضم للمباراة. يمكنك أيضاً الدردشة مع الأصدقاء عن المباريات السابقة
• سجّل للبطولات و الدوريات و تعرف على أحدث النتائج

Be the 1st to Know! 365Scores helps you become an EXPERT OF THE GAME with Live Scores, Pre-Game Stats and Predictions, In-Depth Data, News Updates, Upcoming Fixtures, Lineups - and everything else you need to stay connected to your favorite players, teams, and competitions.

Join over 150 million sports fans who rely on 365Scores for real-time updates, pre-game stats and in-depth insights.

* EXTENSIVE SPORTS COVERAGE
Follow the UEFA Champions League, English Premier League, LaLiga, NBA, Wimbledon, and 2000+ competitions in 10 different types of sports, including top football, basketball, tennis events and much more – all in one live scores app.

* LIVE FOOTBALL RESULTS
Get all the latest football news and updates, right at your fingertips! Football scores from your favorite football teams, such as Real Madrid, Manchester City, Liverpool and much more!

* EXCLUSIVE iOS FEATURES
365Scores offers two powerful iOS widgets to keep you closer to the game than ever:
Home Screen Widget – Instantly view your personalized My Scores list with live and upcoming games — right on your home screen. Perfect for quick updates and easy access to the matches you care about.
Live Activities – View real-time scores directly on your home screen, even when your phone is locked.

* TEAM NEWS & STATS
No matter which team you support, 365Scores delivers everything you need: live scores, sports news, squad updates, real-time stats, league tables, transfer updates, and social media buzz.

* PRE-GAME STATS & PREDICTIONS
Get a competitive edge with our comprehensive pre-game stats, including head-to-head records, recent form, key player analysis, and expert insights. These data-driven predictions help you to prepare for each game. Stay ahead of the game with 365Scores!

* CUSTOM SPORTS SCOREBOARD
Choose your favorite teams and leagues to follow, or pick matches instantly.
Get real-time football updates whenever you need them.

* INSTANT MATCH NOTIFICATIONS
Stay updated with instant match alerts! Follow every play with our Live Match Tracker, even when you can’t watch live
Warning! Our live match notifications may be faster than your match stream!

* LIVE SPORTS CALENDAR
Check our ALL SCORES tab, the most updated multi-sport calendar that you can find.
365Scores delivers full coverage of 9 sports: Football, Basketball, Tennis, American Football, Baseball, Handball, Ice Hockey, Rugby and Volleyball - with more than 2,000 competitions, including: UEFA Champions League, English Premier League, Spanish LaLiga, German Bundesliga, Italian Serie A, AFC Champions League, NBA, NFL, NHL, MLB, Wimbledon and much more!

Be an expert of the game with 365Scores – download now and never miss a moment!

We’re always happy for any feedback!

Take your football experience to the next level!
Create and manage football matches effortlessly — whether you’re an organizer or a player. Browse and join upcoming matches, check detailed match info, and stay updated with today’s and past game lists.

Simple, smart, and built for everyone who loves the game.

Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications
• Personalized news and alerts for your favorite clubs and players
• Home screen widgets with news and live matches
• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps
• Video highlights and audio commentary
• Live text commentary to follow the action as it happens
• Transfer updates and breaking news
• TV schedules so you know exactly when and where to watch
• Weekly Team of the Week (TOTW) and player ratings

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.

NOVA Soccer Hub App - delivers a complete Soccer tracking experience for fans worldwide. Whether you want to follow live scores, analyze matches, check team lineups, or explore player profiles, this app has it all—wrapped in a clean and intuitive interface.

NOVA Soccer Hub App Key Features:

* Live Match Center - Follow real-time updates with live scores, match time, key events, and team lineups.

* Detailed Statistics - View comprehensive stats including shots, passes, fouls, offsides, possession, and more—visually compared between both sides.

* Fixture & Schedule View - Plan ahead or look back with a calendar-based view of upcoming and past matches sorted by day.

* Predictions & Analytics - Check team performance, form streaks, head-to-head comparisons, and match outcome predictions based on data.

* Point Tables & Standings - Track team positions and points across various leagues and tournaments.

* Team Overview & Profiles - Get venue details, overall performance records, and recent match outcomes. Explore squad rosters categorized by position.

* Player Profiles - Dive into individual player stats, bio details (age, height, nationality, position), recent matches, and league-wise performance breakdown.

* Explore by Country - Search and filter content based on your favorite countries or regions, allowing for a personalized football-following experience.

* Favorites Tab - Save your favorite matches, teams, players, and leagues to quickly access them anytime from one central tab.

Whether you're a casual viewer or a dedicated football analyst, NOVA Soccer Hub App is dedicated to stay informed, entertained, and engaged—no matter the league, team, or competition. Download Nova Soccer Hub app now.

The Exposure Events app is your all-encompassing guide for sporting events, meticulously crafted to cater to the needs of team and college coaches, media, players, parents, and fans. Designed to bring every essential aspect of the event to your fingertips, this platform ensures you stay connected and well-informed.

Key Features:



• Quick team search and user friendly shortcuts.
• Up-to-the-minute schedules to keep you on track.
• Live standings and brackets for real-time updates.
• Immediate game notifications so you never miss a beat.
• Venue directions for easy navigation.

• Essential event documents, messages, and contact details for complete guidance.

With the Exposure Events app, every detail of the event is conveniently at your fingertips, ensuring an immersive and comprehensive experience for everyone involved.

Featured by Apple as 'The best app for golfers'! Join millions of golfers using 18Birdies to shoot lower scores with the help of our breakthrough game improvement tools. Get incredibly accurate distances for how far to hit every shot at courses worldwide. View 3D Green Maps to help you read putt breaks and see detailed slopes of the green for approach shots to help you hit it close.  See how far every shot you hit goes during a round and track performance & progress with a digital scorecard. You'll even get suggestions on how to improve based on how your stats compare to other golfers in your skill level. Create tournaments for groups of friends, get swing tips and share your love of golf with friends.  

Using 18Birdies is like having a Tour-level caddy and GPS rangefinder in your pocket. Play every hole like a pro with accurate “Plays Like" distances based on elevation change, wind, rain, temperature, and more.

Looking to improve your game? Upload a video of your swing to AI Coach and get instant feedback on what swing faults to focus on with custom video tips walking you through exactly how to fix those swing faults.  It's like a coach in your pocket, anytime you need swing advice AI Coach is there to help. 

Make the most out of your practice sessions with 18Birdies. Compare stats with other players in your skill level to help you figure out how to improve faster.

FREE FEATURES:

-GPS RANGEFINDER: Find your distance from anywhere on the course.
-STATS & ROUND HISTORY: Track your stats in a few taps and view all your past rounds – forever.
-HANDICAP: Track how your game is trending.
-AUTO HOLE SWITCHING: Less taps, more golfs.
-SIDE GAMES: Let us do the math and keep track of those side bets. Play 9 different games like Skins, Wolf, Dots, and Points for free!
-SOCIAL FEED: Share swing videos, talk equipment, and celebrate hole-in-ones and more with other golfers from around the world.

PREMIUM FEATURES:

*Access a FREE trial after you download the app

-3D GREEN MAPS: Read putt breaks and see detailed slopes of the green for approach shots to help you hit it close.  
-CADDY+: Get personalized distance and club recommendations based on elevation, temperature, humidity, wind data  and more.
-ADVANCED STATS: Analyze your golf game with even more charts and custom filters.
-SHOT TRACKING: Our most popular feature! Track and get a snapshot of your shots based on distance, shot shape, quality, and power.
-STROKES GAINED: With strokes gained scoring, you can find out where you are losing or gaining strokes against the field – just like the pros!

LOVE THE APP?
Rate us!

SUPPORT
Don’t see your course in our database, want to learn more about our features, or just want to share your feedback? We love hearing from you, so go ahead and shoot us an email at support@18Birdies.com – and we’ll get back to you pronto.


PAYMENT INFORMATION
In addition to our free app, we offer three types of Premium membership: Weekly, Monthly and Annual.  All subscriptions and payments are offered via in-app purchase and will be charged to your iTunes account as soon as we confirm the purchase. All subscriptions auto-renew, unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of your selected subscription duration. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, depending on the option you have selected. All subscriptions can be managed through the App Store. Note: If you upgrade to Premium before the end of your free trial, any unused portion of the trial will be forfeited. For more information, please review the 18Birdies Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions below.

NOTE
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. But 18Birdies has a low battery mode to save your battery on the course.

TERMS OF SERVICE
https://18birdies.com/legal/terms/

GOOGLE MAPS TERMS & PRIVACY
https://www.google.com/policies/terms/
https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
